com.yahoo.gondola.core

Class CoreMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.gondola.core.CoreMember
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stoppable

    public class CoreMember
extends Object
implements Stoppable
    This class is an actor inboxes - the command queue and incoming messages. The command queue contains commands that need to be reliably persisted. The incoming message queue contains messages from the other members of this cluster.

      • isPrimary

        public boolean isPrimary()
        Returns true if this member is the primary member of the cluster. The primary member is the one that is preferred to be the leader, usually for performance reasons.

      • forceLeader

        public void forceLeader()
                 throws Exception

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand(CoreCmd ccmd)
        Adds command to the command queue. Does not block. Called by the command object.

      • addIncoming

        public void addIncoming(Message message)
                 throws InterruptedException
        Adds message to the incoming queue. Does not block. Called by connection objects after receiving a message.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • getCommittedLogEntry

        public void getCommittedLogEntry(CoreCmd ccmd,
                                 int index,
                                 int timeout)
                          throws Exception
        Blocks until the requested index is committed.
        Parameters:
        timeout - -1 means there is no timeout.
        index - must be greater than 0.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • indexUpdated

        public void indexUpdated(boolean storageError,
                         boolean entriesDeleted)
        Called by save queue after advancing savedIndex or when receiving updated matchIndex from peers.
        Parameters:
        storageError - If true, an error occurred during a storage operation
        entriesDeleted - If true, the saved index should be updated

        public static CoreMember getCoreMember(Cluster cluster)

        non-null CoreCmd object.
